00060 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_GeometryPrivate {
00061 public:
00062 
00063     int nnow, ntot;
00064     EGS_BaseGeometry **geoms;
00065     vector<string> media;
00066     vector<EGS_Library *> glibs;
00067     static string geom_delimeter;
00068     static string libkey;
00069     static string create_key;
00070     string dso_path;
00071 
00072     EGS_GeometryPrivate() : nnow(0), ntot(0), geoms(0) {
00073         //egsInformation("EGS_GeometryPrivate() at 0x%x\n",this);
00074         setUp();
00075     };
00076 
00077     EGS_GeometryPrivate(const EGS_GeometryPrivate &p) :
00078         nnow(0), ntot(0), geoms(0) {
00079         //egsInformation("EGS_GeometryPrivate(0x%x) at 0x%x\n",&p,this);
00080         setUp();
00081     };
00082 
00083     void setUp() {
00084         char *hhouse = getenv("HEN_HOUSE");
00085         if( !hhouse )
00086             egsFatal("Environment variable HEN_HOUSE must be defined\n");
00087         dso_path = hhouse;
00088 #if defined WIN32 && !defined CYGWIN
00089         char c = '\\';
00090 #else
00091         char c = '/';
00092 #endif
00093         if( dso_path[dso_path.size()-1] != c ) dso_path += c;
00094         //dso_path += "geometry"; dso_path += c;
00095         dso_path += "egs++"; dso_path += c;
00096         dso_path += "dso"; dso_path += c;
00097         dso_path += CONFIG_NAME;
00098     };
00099 
00100     ~EGS_GeometryPrivate() {
00101         //egsInformation("Destructing EGS_GeometryPrivate at 0x%x, "
00102         //        "ntot=%d nnow=%d\n",this,ntot,nnow);
00103         if( !ntot ) return;
00104         clearGeometries();
00105         delete [] geoms;
00106         //egsInformation("Deleting geometry libs\n");
00107         { for(unsigned int j=0; j<glibs.size(); j++) delete glibs[j]; }
00108     };
00109 
00110     void clearGeometries() {
00111         media.clear();
00112         if( !ntot ) return;
00113         int j = 0, iloop = 0;
00114         while( nnow > 0 ) {
00115             if( geoms[j]->deref() == -1 ) delete geoms[j];
00116             else geoms[j++]->ref();
00117             if( j >= nnow && nnow ) {
00118                 j = 0; ++iloop;
00119                 if( iloop > 20 ) egsWarning("~EGS_GeometryPrivate(): failed "
00120                    "to delete all geometries after 20 loops!\n");
00121                 break;
00122             }
00123         }
00124     };
00125 
00126     void grow(int ngrow) {
00127         ntot += ngrow;
00128         EGS_BaseGeometry **tmp = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [ntot];
00129         for(int j=0; j<nnow; j++) tmp[j] = geoms[j];
00130         if( geoms ) delete [] geoms;
00131         geoms = tmp;
00132     };
00133 
00134     int addGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00135         if( !g ) return -1;
00136         for(int j=0; j<nnow; j++)
00137             if( geoms[j]->getName() == g->getName() ) return -1;
00138         if( nnow >= ntot ) grow(10);
00139         geoms[nnow++] = g; return nnow-1;
00140 
00141     };
00142 
00143     void removeGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00144         for(int j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00145             if( geoms[j] == g ) { geoms[j] = geoms[--nnow]; break; }
00146         }
00147     };
00148 
00149     EGS_BaseGeometry *getGeometry(const string &name) {
00150         for(int j=0; j<nnow; j++)
00151             if( geoms[j]->getName() == name ) return geoms[j];
00152         return 0;
00153     };
00154 
00155     int addMedium(const string &Name) {
00156         if( EGS_Input::compare(Name,"vacuum") ) return -1;
00157         for(unsigned int j=0; j<media.size(); j++)
00158             if( media[j] == Name ) return j;
00159         media.push_back(Name); return media.size()-1;
00160     };
00161 
00162     int getMediumIndex(const string &Name) {
00163         for(unsigned int j=0; j<media.size(); j++)
00164             if( media[j] == Name ) return j;
00165         return -1;
00166     };
00167 
00168     int nMedia() const { return media.size(); };
00169 
00170     const char *getMediumName(int ind) const {
00171         if( ind < 0 || ind > media.size()-1 ) return 0;
00172         return media[ind].c_str();
00173     };
00174 
00175     EGS_BaseGeometry *createSingleGeometry(EGS_Input *i);
00176 
00177 };
00178 
00179 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateGeometryLists {
00180 public:
00181     EGS_PrivateGeometryLists() : nnow(0), ntot(0) {
00182         addList(new EGS_GeometryPrivate);
00183     };
00184     ~EGS_PrivateGeometryLists() {
00185         //egsInformation("Deleting geometry lists\n");
00186         if( ntot > 0 ) {
00187             for(int j=0; j<nnow; j++) {
00188                 //egsInformation("Deleting list %d\n",j);
00189                 delete lists[j];
00190             }
00191             delete [] lists;
00192         }
00193     };
00194     int size() const { return nnow; };
00195     EGS_GeometryPrivate &operator[](int j) { return *lists[j]; };
00196     void addList(EGS_GeometryPrivate *l) {
00197         if( !l ) return;
00198         if( nnow >= ntot ) {
00199             EGS_GeometryPrivate **tmp = new EGS_GeometryPrivate* [ntot+10];
00200             for(int j=0; j<nnow; j++) tmp[j] = lists[j];
00201             if( ntot > 0 ) delete [] lists;
00202             lists = tmp; ntot += 10;
00203         }
00204         lists[nnow++] = l;
00205     };
00206     int nnow, ntot;
00207     EGS_GeometryPrivate **lists;
00208 };

00212 string EGS_GeometryPrivate::create_key = "createGeometry";

00227 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00228 EGS_BaseGeometry *EGS_GeometryPrivate::createSingleGeometry(EGS_Input *i) {
00229     string libname;
00230     if( !i ) {
00231         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: null input?\n");
00232         return 0;
00233     }
00234     int error = i->getInput(EGS_GeometryPrivate::libkey,libname);
00235     if( error ) {
00236         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: input item %s does not define the"
00237                 " geometry library\n",i->name());
00238         return 0;
00239     }
00240     EGS_Library *lib = 0;
00241     for(unsigned int j=0; j<glibs.size(); j++) {
00242         if( libname == glibs[j]->libraryName() ) {
00243             lib = glibs[j]; break;
00244         }
00245     }
00246     if( !lib ) {
00247         lib = new EGS_Library(libname.c_str(),dso_path.c_str()); lib->load();
00248         if( !lib->isLoaded() ) {
00249             egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: Failed to load library '%s' from"
00250                     " %s\n",libname.c_str(),dso_path.c_str());
00251             return 0;
00252         }
00253         glibs.push_back(lib);
00254     }
00255     EGS_GeometryCreationFunction gcreate = (EGS_GeometryCreationFunction)
00256         lib->resolve(EGS_GeometryPrivate::create_key.c_str());
00257     if( !gcreate ) {
00258         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: failed to resolve the %s function\n"
00259                 "  in geometry library %s\n",
00260                 EGS_GeometryPrivate::create_key.c_str(),lib->libraryName());
00261         return 0;
00262     }
00263     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = gcreate(i);
00264     if( !g ) {
00265         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: got null geometry\n");
00266         egsWarning("  library: %s\n",lib->libraryName());
00267         egsWarning("  input:\n"); i->print(4,cerr);
00268         return 0;
00269     }
00270     if( !addGeometry(g) ) {
00271         egsWarning("createSingleGeometry: failed to add the geometry %s\n"
00272                 " to the list of geometries. This implies that a geometry with"
00273                 " this name already exists\n",g->getName().c_str());
00274         delete g; return 0;
00275     }
00276     return g;
00277 
00278 }
00279 #endif

00281 //static EGS_LOCAL vector<EGS_GeometryPrivate> egs_geometries;
00282 static EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateGeometryLists egs_geometries;
00283 
00284 EGS_Float EGS_BaseGeometry::howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00285         const EGS_Vector &u) {
00286     if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00287     EGS_Vector xx(x); EGS_Float ttot = 0;
00288     while(1) {
00289         EGS_Float t = 1e30; int inew = howfar(ireg,xx,u,t);
00290         ttot += t; if( inew < 0 ) break;
00291         xx += u*t; ireg = inew;
00292     }
00293     return ttot;
00294 }

00296 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(int list) {
00297     int n = egs_geometries.size();
00298     //egsInformation("EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList: size=%d list=%d\n",
00299     //        n,list);
00300     for(int j=n; j<=list; j++)
00301         //egs_geometries.push_back(EGS_GeometryPrivate());
00302         egs_geometries.addList(new EGS_GeometryPrivate);
00303     active_glist = list;
00304 }

00318 EGS_BaseGeometry::EGS_BaseGeometry(const string &Name) : nreg(0), name(Name),
00319     med(-1), region_media(0), nref(0), debug(false), is_convex(true),
00320     has_rho_scaling(false), rhor(0), bproperty(0), bp_array(0) {
00321     if( !egs_geometries.size() )
00322         egs_geometries.addList(new EGS_GeometryPrivate);
00323     if( !name.size() ) name = getUniqueName();
00324     if( egs_geometries[active_glist].addGeometry(this) < 0 )
00325         egsFatal("EGS_BaseGeometry::EGS_BaseGeometry:\n"
00326             "  a geometry with name %s alread exists\n",name.c_str());
00327 }
00328 
00329 EGS_BaseGeometry::~EGS_BaseGeometry() {
00330     if( region_media ) delete [] region_media;
00331     if( rhor && has_rho_scaling ) delete [] rhor;
00332     if( bp_array ) delete [] bp_array;
00333     //egsInformation("Deleting geometry at 0x%x, list=%d\n",this,active_glist);
00334     egs_geometries[active_glist].removeGeometry(this);
00335 }

00348         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) region_media[j] = med;

00359 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedium(int istart, int iend, const string &Name,
00360         int delta) {
00361     int imed = egs_geometries[active_glist].addMedium(Name);
00362     setMedium(istart,iend,imed,delta);
00363 }
00364 
00365 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedium(int istart, int iend, int imed, int delta) {
00366     if( nreg <= 1 ) { med = imed; return; }
00367     if( delta <= 0 ) return;
00368     if( istart < 0 ) istart = 0;
00369     if( iend > nreg-1 ) iend = nreg-1;
00370     if( !region_media ) {
00371         region_media = new short [nreg];
00372         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) region_media[j] = med;
00373     }
00374     for(int j=istart; j<=iend; j+=delta) region_media[j] = imed;
00375 }

00386 
00387 EGS_BaseGeometry *EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00388     EGS_Input *ginput = input; bool delete_it = false;
00389     if( !input->isA(egs_geometries[active_glist].geom_delimeter) ) {
00390         ginput = input->takeInputItem(egs_geometries[active_glist].geom_delimeter);
00391         delete_it = true;
00392     }
00393     if( !ginput ) {
00394         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: no geometry specification"
00395                 " in this input\n");
00396         return 0;
00397     }
00398     EGS_Input *ij; bool error = false;
00399     while( (ij = ginput->takeInputItem("geometry")) != 0 ) {
00400         EGS_BaseGeometry *g = egs_geometries[active_glist].createSingleGeometry(ij);
00401         if( !g ) error = true;
00402         delete ij;
00403     }
00404     if( error ) {
00405         egsFatal("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: errors during geometry"
00406                 " definition\n"); return 0;
00407     }
00408     string sim_geom;
00409     int err = ginput->getInput("simulation geometry",sim_geom);
00410     if( err ) {
00411         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: missing/wrong keyword"
00412                 " 'simulation geometry'\n");
00413         return 0;
00414     }
00415     EGS_BaseGeometry *g = egs_geometries[active_glist].getGeometry(sim_geom);
00416     if( !g ) egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry: a geometry with "
00417             "the name %s does not exist\n",sim_geom.c_str());
00418     if( delete_it ) delete ginput;
00419     return g;
00420 }
00421 
00422 string EGS_BaseGeometry::getUniqueName() {
00423     sprintf(buf_unique,"geometry%d",egs_geometries[active_glist].nnow);
00424     string result(buf_unique); return result;
00425 }
00426 
00427 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setName(EGS_Input *i) {
00428     int err = i->getInput("name",name);
00429     if( err ) name = getUniqueName();
00430     EGS_Input *inp; int irep=0;
00431     while( (inp = i->takeInputItem("replica")) ) {
00432         string typ; int ncopy;
00433         vector<EGS_Float> trans, trans_o;
00434         vector<EGS_Float> rot_axis;
00435         EGS_Float rot_angle, rot_angle_o;
00436         int err1 = inp->getInput("type",typ);
00437         int err2 = inp->getInput("number of copies",ncopy);
00438         int err3 = inp->getInput("translation delta",trans);
00439         int err3a = inp->getInput("first translation",trans_o);
00440         int err4 = inp->getInput("rotation axis",rot_axis);
00441         int err5 = inp->getInput("rotation delta",rot_angle);
00442         int err5a = inp->getInput("first rotation",rot_angle_o);
00443         bool do_it = true; int ttype;
00444         if( err1 || err2 ) {
00445             if( err1 ) egsWarning("geometry replication: 'type' not defined ->"
00446                     " ignoring input\n");
00447             if( err2 ) egsWarning("geometry replication: 'number of copies' "
00448                     "not defined -> ignoring input\n");
00449             do_it = false;
00450         }
00451         else {
00452             if( ncopy < 1 ) {
00453                 egsWarning("geometry replication: %d copies?\n",ncopy);
00454                 do_it = false;
00455             }
00456             if( typ == "line" ) {
00457                 if( trans.size() != 3 ) {
00458                     egsWarning("geometry replication: got %d inputs for "
00459                       "'translation', need 3\n",trans.size());
00460                     do_it = false;
00461                 }
00462                 else {
00463                     if( err3a ) {
00464                         trans_o.push_back(0); trans_o.push_back(0);
00465                         trans_o.push_back(0);
00466                     }
00467                 }
00468                 ttype = 0;
00469             }
00470             else if( typ == "rotation" ) {
00471                 if( rot_axis.size() != 3 ) {
00472                     egsWarning("geometry replication: got %d inputs for "
00473                       "'rotation axis', need 3\n",rot_axis.size());
00474                     do_it = false;
00475                 }
00476                 if( err4 ) {
00477                     egsWarning("geometry replication: missing 'rotation delta'"
00478                         " input\n");
00479                     do_it = false;
00480                 }
00481                 if( err5a ) rot_angle_o = 0;
00482                 ttype = 1;
00483             }
00484             else {
00485                 egsWarning("geometry replication: unknown replica type %s\n",
00486                         typ.c_str()); do_it = false;
00487             }
00488         }
00489         if( do_it ) {
00490             ++irep; char buf[1024];
00491             for(int icopy=1; icopy<=ncopy; icopy++) {
00492                 //string content(":start geometry:\n");
00493                 string content;
00494                 content += "    library = egs_gtransformed\n";
00495                 sprintf(buf,"    name = %s_rep%d_%d\n",name.c_str(),irep,icopy);
00496                 content += buf;
00497                 sprintf(buf,"    my geometry = %s\n",name.c_str());
00498                 content += buf;
00499                 content += "    :start transformation:\n";
00500                 if( ttype == 0 )
00501                     sprintf(buf,"        translation = %g %g %g\n",
00502                             trans_o[0]+trans[0]*icopy,
00503                             trans_o[1]+trans[1]*icopy,
00504                             trans_o[2]+trans[2]*icopy);
00505                 else
00506                     sprintf(buf,"        rotation = %g %g %g  %g\n",
00507                        rot_axis[0],rot_axis[1],rot_axis[2],
00508                        rot_angle_o+rot_angle*icopy);
00509                 content += buf;
00510                 content += "    :stop transformation:\n";
00511                 //content += ":stop geometry:\n";
00512                 EGS_Input aux; aux.setContentFromString(content);
00513                 EGS_BaseGeometry *g =
00514                     EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(&aux);
00515                 if( !g ) egsWarning("geometry replication: failed to create"
00516                       " replica %d of %s\n",icopy,name.c_str());
00517                 //else egsInformation("geometry replication: created replica"
00518                 //       " %s\n",g->getName().c_str());
00519             }
00520         }
00521     }
00522 }
00523 
00524 void EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo() const {
00525     egsInformation("======================== geometry =====================\n");
00526     egsInformation(" type = %s\n",getType().c_str());
00527     egsInformation(" name = %s\n",getName().c_str());
00528     egsInformation(" number of regions = %d\n",nreg);
00529 }
00530 
00531 void EGS_BaseGeometry::describeGeometries() {
00532     egsInformation("\nThe following geometries are defined:\n\n");
00533     for(int j=0; j<egs_geometries[active_glist].nnow; j++)
00534         egs_geometries[active_glist].geoms[j]->printInfo();
00535 }
00536 
00537 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *inp) {
00538     EGS_Input *input = inp; bool delete_it = false;
00539     if( !input->isA("media input") ) {
00540         input = inp->takeInputItem("media input");
00541         if( !input ) return;
00542         // i.e., if there is no media related input for this geometry,
00543         // we don't warn as we assume that media will be set from the outside
00544         delete_it = true;
00545     }
00546     vector<string> media_names;
00547     int err = input->getInput("media",media_names);
00548     int *med_ind = 0; int nmed = media_names.size();
00549     if( !err && nmed > 0 ) {
00550         med_ind = new int [nmed];
00551         for(int j=0; j<nmed; j++)
00552             med_ind[j] = egs_geometries[active_glist].addMedium(media_names[j]);
00553     }
00554     else {
00555         nmed = nMedia();
00556         if( nmed < 1 ) { if( delete_it ) delete input; return; }
00557         med_ind = new int [nmed];
00558         for(int j=0; j<nmed; j++) med_ind[j] = j;
00559     }
00560     setMedia(input,nmed,med_ind);
00561     setRelativeRho(input);
00562     delete [] med_ind; if( delete_it ) delete input;
00563 }
00564 
00565 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *input, int nmed, const int *mind) {
00566     EGS_Input *i; med = mind[0];
00567     while( (i = input->takeInputItem("set medium")) ) {
00568         vector<int> inp;
00569         int err = i->getInput("set medium",inp);
00570         delete i;
00571         if( !err ) {
00572             //if( inp.size() == 2 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[0]+1,mind[inp[1]]);
00573             if( inp.size() == 2 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[0],mind[inp[1]]);
00574             else if( inp.size() == 3 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]]);
00575             else if( inp.size() == 4 ) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]],inp[3]);
00576             else egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(): found %d inputs\n"
00577                   "in a 'set medium' input. 2 or 3 are allowed\n",inp.size());
00578         }
00579         else egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setMedia(): wrong 'set medium'"
00580               " input\n");
00581     }
00582 }
00583 
00584 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho) {
00585     if( start < 0 ) start = 0;
00586     if( end >= nreg ) end = nreg-1;
00587     if( end >= start ) {
00588         int j;
00589         if( !rhor ) {
00590             rhor = new EGS_Float [nreg];
00591             for(j=0; j<nreg; j++) rhor[j] = 1;
00592         }
00593         for(j=start; j<=end; j++) rhor[j] = rho;
00594         has_rho_scaling = true;
00595     }
00596 }
00597 
00598 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *input) {
00599     EGS_Input *i;
00600     while( (i = input->takeInputItem("set relative density")) ) {
00601         vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00602         int err = i->getInput("set relative density",tmp);
00603         if( !err ) {
00604             if( tmp.size() == 2 ) {
00605                 int start = (int) (tmp[0]+0.1); int end = start;
00606                 setRelativeRho(start,end,tmp[1]);
00607             }
00608             else if( tmp.size() == 3 ) {
00609                 int start = (int) (tmp[0]+0.1); int end = (int) (tmp[1]+0.1);
00610                 setRelativeRho(start,end,tmp[2]);
00611             }
00612             else {
00613                 egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setRelativeRho(): found %d "
00614                   "inputs in a 'set relative density' input.\n",tmp.size());
00615                 egsWarning("  2 or 3 are allowed => input ignored\n");
00616             }
00617         }
00618         delete i;
00619     }
00620 }
00621 
00622 int EGS_BaseGeometry::computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00623         const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00624     if( n < 1 ) return -1;
00625     int ifirst = 0; EGS_Float t, ttot = 0; EGS_Vector x(X); int imed;
00626     if( ireg < 0 ) {
00627         t = 1e30; ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00628         if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00629         isections[0].t = t; isections[0].rhof = 1;
00630         isections[0].ireg = -1; isections[0].imed = -1;
00631         ttot = t; ++ifirst; x += u*t;
00632     }
00633     else imed = medium(ireg);
00634 
00635     for(int j=ifirst; j<n; j++) {
00636         isections[j].imed = imed; isections[j].rhof = getRelativeRho(ireg);
00637         isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00638         t = 1e30; int inew = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00639         ttot += t; isections[j].t = ttot;
00640         if( inew < 0 || inew == ireg ) return j+1;
00641         ireg = inew; x += u*t;
00642     }
00643 
00644     return ireg >= 0 ? -1 : n;
00645 
00646 }
00647 
00648 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop) {
00649     bproperty = prop;
00650     if( bp_array ) { delete [] bp_array; bp_array = 0; }
00651 }
00652 
00653 void EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty(int bit) {
00654     if( bit < 0 || bit >= 8*sizeof(EGS_BPType) ) {
00655         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty: attempt to set the "
00656              "%d'th bith!\n",bit); return;
00657     }
00658     EGS_BPType prop = 1 << bit;
00659     bproperty |= prop;
00660     if( bp_array ) {
00661         for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) bp_array[j] |= prop;
00662     }
00663 }
00664 
00665 void EGS_BaseGeometry::setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop, int start, int end,
00666         int step) {
00667     if( start < 0 ) start = 0;
00668     if( end >= nreg ) end = nreg-1;
00669     if( start == 0 && end == nreg-1 && step==1 ) setBooleanProperty(prop);
00670     else {
00671         if( !bp_array ) {
00672             bp_array = new EGS_BPType [nreg];
00673             for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) bp_array[j] = 0;
00674         }
00675         for(int j=start; j<=end; j+=step) bp_array[j] = prop;
00676     }
00677 }
00678 
00679 void EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty(int bit, int start, int end,
00680         int step) {
00681     if( bit < 0 || bit >= 8*sizeof(EGS_BPType) ) {
00682         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::addBooleanProperty: attempt to set the "
00683              "%d'th bith!\n",bit); return;
00684     }
00685     if( start < 0 ) start = 0;
00686     if( end >= nreg ) end = nreg-1;
00687     if( start == 0 && end == nreg-1 && step==1 ) addBooleanProperty(bit);
00688     else {
00689         EGS_BPType prop = 1 << bit;
00690         if( !bp_array ) {
00691             bp_array = new EGS_BPType [nreg];
00692             for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) bp_array[j] = 0;
00693         }
00694         for(int j=start; j<=end; j+=step) bp_array[j] |= prop;
00695     }
00696 }
00697 
00698 void EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00699 
00700     // get all regions lists for this named label
00701     for (int i=0; i<labels.size(); i++) {
00702         if (labels[i].name.compare(str) == 0) {
00703             regs.insert(regs.end(), labels[i].regions.begin(), labels[i].regions.end());
00704         }
00705     }
00706 
00707     // sort region list and remove duplicates
00708     sort (regs.begin(), regs.end());
00709     regs.erase ( unique (regs.begin(), regs.end() ), regs.end());
00710 }
00711 
00712 
00713 int EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(EGS_Input *input) {
00714     EGS_Input *i;
00715     int labelCount=0;
00716     while( (i = input->takeInputItem("set label")) ) {
00717 
00718         // get input string
00719         string inp;
00720         int err = i->getInput("set label",inp);
00721         delete i;
00722 
00723         // bail out on read error
00724         if (err) {
00725             egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(): error while reading 'set label' input\n");
00726             return 0;
00727         }
00728 
00729         // set the labels from input string
00730         int nLabel = setLabels(inp);
00731 
00732         // increase label count
00733         labelCount += nLabel;
00734     }
00735 
00736     return labelCount;
00737 }
00738 
00739 
00740 int EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(const string &inp) {
00741 
00742     // tokenize input string
00743     vector<string> tokens;
00744     const char *ptr = inp.c_str();
00745     do {
00746         const char *begin = ptr;
00747         while (*ptr != ' ' && *ptr) {
00748             ptr++;
00749         }
00750         tokens.push_back (string (begin, ptr));
00751     } while (*ptr++ != '\0');
00752 
00753     // bail out if there are no label tokens
00754     if (tokens.size() < 1) {
00755         egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(): no label name\n");
00756         return 0;
00757     }
00758 
00759     // parse label into a label class
00760     label lab;
00761     lab.name = tokens[0];
00762     for (int i=1; i<tokens.size(); i++) {
00763         int reg = atoi(tokens[i].c_str());
00764         if (reg < nreg && reg >= 0) {
00765             lab.regions.push_back(reg);
00766         }
00767         else {
00768             egsWarning("EGS_BaseGeometry::setLabels(): label \"%s\": region %d is beyond the number " \
00769                         "of regions in this geometry\n", lab.name.c_str(), reg);
00770         }
00771     }
00772 
00773     // continue if there is no region
00774     if (lab.regions.size() <= 0) return 0;
00775 
00776     // sort region list and remove duplicates
00777     sort (lab.regions.begin(), lab.regions.end());
00778     lab.regions.erase ( unique (lab.regions.begin(), lab.regions.end() ), lab.regions.end());
00779 
00780     // push current label onto vector of labels
00781     labels.push_back(lab);
00782 
00783     return 1;
00784 }
